alert.note: Alert for Lake (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 17 at 12:28PM EST until February 19 at 3:24AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Cleveland OH has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Ohio... Chagrin River At Willoughby affecting Lake County. Grand River At Painesville affecting Lake County. Maumee River At Waterville affecting Wood and Lucas Counties. Nimishillen Creek Near North Industry affecting Stark County. For the Chagrin River...including Willoughby...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Grand River...including Painesville...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Maumee River...including Waterville...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Nimishillen Creek...including North Industry...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO EARLY SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Chagrin River At Willoughby. * WHEN...From this evening to early Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Flooding is possible along the northern section of Trailard, Milann, and Chagrin Drives in Waite Hill. Dodd Road inundated near Eagle Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:15 AM EST Thursday the stage was 8.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 13.2 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 13.2 feet on 02/26/1962. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening by 1030 PM EST.
